channel.title: I think there's a bug!
channel.description:
Well, at first i thought it was just me until it started ocurring a lot lately.
The bug is on some forums, where it has the last post made on the right hand side of the table it sometimes appears blank. I'm not quite sure if i am the only one but just to get help on how to resolve this issue. This issue, for me, has not occurred on Freddy1990.com.

item.title: I think there's a bug!
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

[quote=“IP-Drowner, post:5, topic:199679”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=264322.msg2185686#msg2185686 date=1208149674]
It happens if someone double posts.
[/quote]
Oh… I thought it was probably just me, or my browser settings. Because on other SMF forums when people double post their post still shows. Thanks :)[/quote]It only happens on these forums, because of the redneck mods.

Read full topic
